about_the_game:
Game Description
It is a daily routine from under the anomaly, trapped in the day before the high school graduation ceremony, you will repeat, repeat and repeat again to find the answer to release the reincarnation.
Will you regain the fondness of your memories of school? Or will you break out of your daily routine and make a scene in the town where you used to live?
Or is it to face your heart honestly and face your fears, worries and confusion.
This is your story, your farewell cycle of what has passed, what has not passed, and what will pass.

Character Introduction
You
You are a graduating senior who has not done anything out of the ordinary during the three years of high school in order to get through it smoothly, and finally graduated from high school.
However, it is also an omen that you may get a graduation ceremony that is too dull to be dull anymore.

Mo Huan
The obscure top student in the class, with whom you usually do not have much social interaction, or even say little social interaction with anyone else.
Obviously an excellent student representative with all-round development in moral, intellectual and physical aspects, but always able to skillfully avoid almost all the remarks about her.

Xuan Ye
She is in the same grade and is known as a delinquent girl in school.
She has no idea what kind of background and tactics she has, and even the seniors who used to be socially active will give her some face, and she will often come back to school to "visit" them after they graduate.
You were once targeted by Xuan Ye, for which you were even reduced to a free meal card for three years.



Featured gameplay
A day-to-day reincarnation of the narrative, with a return to classic themes and narrative breakthroughs.
A second-person narrative with a strong interactive style, reducing the inner drama and enhancing the immersive plot experience.
a rich selection of branches to imagine your own day.
Explore the differences in the reincarnation, we have a deeper story waiting for you to discover.

short_description: Before the day of saying goodbye to the past comes, your life - stalled on this summer day. you are stuck on the penultimate day before the end of your high school life. Will you spend it with the teenage girl you only started to get familiar with on this day？
